title: Oak Ridge Boys Tickets: CapitalCityTickets.com is Slashing Their Prices on Oak Ridge Boys Concert Tickets for their 2015 “Christmas Night Out Tour” Dates
text:
Oak Ridge Boys concert tickets for their 2015 “Christmas Night Out Tour” dates are on sale now. Trusted secondary ticket market provider CapitalCityTickets.com is providing Oak Ridge Boys fans with a promo code CITY5 to save an additional 5% on all orders.
CapitalCityTickets.com carries a vast selection of Oak Ridge Boys concert tickets at affordable prices. The Oak Ridge Boys are hitting the road in 2015 with their “Christmas Night Out Tour” and kicking it all off on November 17th in Branson, MO.
The Oak Ridge Boys will be dinging their hits like “Elvira” and “Bobbie Sue” along with all the holiday classics. Oak Ridge Boys consist of Richard Sterban, Duane Allen, William Lee Golden and Joe Bonsall.
CLICK HERE to browse all levels of seating for Oak Ridge Boys concerts at CapitalCityTickets.com.
